pages.text: Cartridges are created in the $(l:essentials/workbench_and_blueprints)Engineer's Workbench$(), by the use of specific Engineer's Blueprints. Blueprints for normal ammunition you can create yourself, but some more advanced types will require you to buy adequate blueprints from someone else.

$(#007500)Empty Casings$() and $(#007500)Shells$() are the basis for every projectile. Empty Casings can also be crafted in the $(l:patchouli:heavy/metal_press)Metal Press$(), using the appropriate mold, at a greatly reduced cost.
$(#007500)Casull Cartridges$() are created with a 'Common Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)They are a simple lead projectile inflicting medium damage.
$(#007500)Armor-Piercing Cartridges$() are created with a 'Common Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)They do the same amount of damage but penetrate armor by sheer kinetic force.

$(#007500)Buckshot Cartridges$() are created with a 'Common Projectiles' blueprint. They are filled with multiple small projectiles that are fired out in a cone shape. $(br)This cartridge is highly effective at short range.
$(#007500)Silver Cartridges$() are created with a 'Common Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)They consist of a lead core wrapped in silver, making them highly effective against undead.
$(#007500)High-Explosive Cartridges$() are created with a 'Specialized Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)They fire a projectile that explodes on impact, causing damage to living creatures and terrain.

$(#007500)Dragon's Breath Cartridges$() are created with a 'Specialized Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)Similarly to Buckshot, they are effective at short range, but instead of small metal shots, they are filled with a flammable metal dust, creating a blast of flame.

$(#007500)Phial Cartridges$() are created with a 'Specialized Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)They can be filled with any potion by crafting them together in a crafting grid and this potion will then be applied on impact. Normal potions require a direct hit, splash potions have an area of effect and Lingering Potions will create a temporary, lingering potion cloud.

$(#007500)Flare Cartridges$() are created with a 'Specialized Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)When fired, the flare explodes after a certain distance and then slowly sinks to the ground. You can combine the cartridge with dyes in a crafting table to change its colour. $(br)The flare can also be crafted using $(#007500)Green$() or $(#007500)Yellow$() dye, rather than red.
$(#007500)Homing Cartridges$() are created with a 'Specialized Projectiles' blueprint.$(br)These projectiles gain the ability to seek out and chase the closest target.

Wolfpack Cartridges are created with a 'Specialized Projectiles' blueprint. $(br)They consist of a collection of multiple homing shots in a single shell. The initial projectile is unguided, but on impact, it splits into six target seeking shots that shred surrounding enemies.
